Employee.title: Employee
Employee.description: Represents an employee in the PayEase system.

employeeId.description: The unique identifier for the employee.

email.description: The email address of the employee.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the employee.

avatar.description: The avatar character for the employee.

department.description: The department the employee belongs to.

baseSalary.description: The base salary of the employee.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the PayEase system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. Owned by the user (path-based ownership).

/employees/{employeeId}.description: Stores employee data. All authenticated users can access.
